p: Several kinds of bioactive proteins and peptides have been isolated from G. frondosa with notable health benefits and medicinal values, although studies on these aspects are fewer than those on the bioactive polysaccharide fractions. Table 5 summarizes some typical bioactive proteins and peptides isolated from G. frondosa. As shown in the table, these bioactive proteins/peptides were extracted mainly from the G. frondosa fruiting body, with average molecular weights around 20â€“88 kDa.
